channel.title: CVE Feed for WPCone.com -- ConeBlog – WordPress Blog Widgets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPCone.com -- ConeBlog – WordPress Blog Widgets

item.title: CVE-2024-37918|2024-07-20T09:01:48.790Z -- wpcone.com -- coneblog%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20blog%20widgets
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPCone.Com ConeBlog – WordPress Blog Widgets allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ConeBlog – WordPress Blog Widgets: from n/a through 1.4.8.
